ruleset.name: Comments
ruleset.description: Rules intended to catch errors related to code comments

rule.name: CommentRequired
rule.description: Denotes whether comments are required (or unwanted) for specific language elements.

rule.name: CommentSize
rule.description: Determines whether the dimensions of non-header comments found are within the specified limits.

rule.name: CommentContent
rule.description: A rule for the politically correct... we don't want to offend anyone.
rule.example: //OMG, this is horrible, Bob is an idiot !!!

rule.name: CommentDefaultAccessModifier
rule.description: To avoid mistakes if we want that a Method, Constructor, Field or Nested class have a default access modifier we must add a comment at the beginning of it's declaration. By default the comment must be /* default */, if you want another, you have to provide a regexp.
